title: List Your Project
subtitle: Are you a developer with an off-plan project in Dubai? Submit your project details and reach international buyers looking for premium properties.

success.title: Thank You!
success.received: Your project submission has been received.
success.review: Our team will review your submission and contact you within 2-3 business days.

form.projectInfoDesc: Please provide detailed information about your off-plan project. All fields are required unless marked as optional.
form.projectDescriptionPlaceholder: Provide a detailed description of your project, including key features, amenities, and unique selling points...
form.uploadPrompt: Upload project images, floor plans, or brochures
form.dragDrop: Drag and drop files here, or click to browse
form.submitDisclaimer: By submitting this form, you agree to our terms and conditions. We will review your submission and contact you within 2-3 business days.
